name: LatAm UnBoxed
host: Diego Rodríguez, Logistics Practice Director at Americas Market Intelligence
description: LatAm Unboxed is your quick, no-fluff dive into the logistics and industry trends shaping Latin America. In under 10 minutes, we provide authentic insights from regional experts, cutting through the media noise to highlight what’s really happening on the ground. Fast, fresh, and focused—your go-to source for staying ahead in LatAm powered by Americas Market Intelligence.

recent_episodes.title: What China's Latest Policy Paper Could Mean for the LatAm Logistics Industry
recent_episodes.description:
In this episode, we highlight key takeaways from China’s Policy Paper on Latin America and the Caribbean, published in December 2025, and what this could mean LatAm governments and businesses, especially in logistics.

To help us parse this policy paper, we are joined by R. Evan Ellis, Research Professor of Latin American Studies at the US Army War College.

Don’t miss the opportunity to understand China’s approach in the region and how this could affect your business.

recent_episodes.title: 4 Mega-Trends Impacting LatAm Logistics Beyond Just 2026
recent_episodes.description:
In this episode, we break down four massive forces reshaping Latin America’s logistics landscape over the next few years:

Global supply chain disruptionDeregulation driven by a rightward political shiftRising Asian business influenceExpanding technology investments

But we’re not just explaining what's happening — we're translating each mega-trend into actionable strategy.

recent_episodes.title: El futuro energético de Colombia sopla desde La Guajira
recent_episodes.description:
En este episodio, Diego Rodríguez Paez —director de la práctica logística de Americas Market Intelligence— entrevista a Luis Guillermo Baquero, Gerente Mesa ANDI La Guajira. ANDI son las siglas de la Asociación Nacional de Empresarios de Colombia y La Guajira es uno de los departamentos del país.

Luis trabaja con empresas del sector minero energético, articulando esfuerzos para fomentar la viabilidad de proyectos de energías renovables en La Guajira.

score_reason: Highly specialized in Latin American logistics and supply chain with no overlap with marketing, AI, or Andreas's food/agriculture marketing expertise.
